        public static void setSecuredConfiguration(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                           String servicePrincipal,
                                           String spnegoPrincipal)
        Set up configuration for a secure HDFS+HBase cluster.
        Parameters:
        conf - configuration object.
        servicePrincipal - service principal used by NN, HM and RS.
        spnegoPrincipal - SPNEGO principal used by NN web UI.
